attributes.review: Trump 2020 ✨🌸🧚🏻‍♀️but on a gravestone🧚🏻‍♀️. This is the worst app I have ever downloaded. The orange 🍊 is the worst person ever, we need to stop him. Frogs 🐸 started CRAWLING out of my phone when I opened the app, and I am severely afraid of frogs 🐸. I have FROGIPHOBIA for heavens sake! Then the frogs 🐸 jumped on me and my dog 🐕 🐶! Like what?!?! I was freaking out, so I ran outside in the fresh air and sun ☀️. Then frogs 🐸 and bugs 🐜 started falling out of the sky 🌌 in a shape the said “Trump 2020”! Can you believe this? Brainwashing 🧠 much?!?! I’m scared 😱 for my life now! This app is horrible, I just want to die now! This app will brainwash you to fall in love 😻 with an orange 🍊. Don’t fall for it! Stay safe guys! And do not ever download this gross app in your lifetime. The orange 🍊 just wants to brainwash 🧠 you!
attributes.title: Frogs and Bugs

attributes.review: It was a normal Wednesday morning when I scrolling threw the hateful disrespectful tictak when I saw a video about how wonderful this app is and how I can show my support to our wonderful bunker baby president. So without even thinking twice I jumped into my App Store and download it, but it took 2 hours!! And while it was downloading it played the national anthem and my phone was completely inoperable!! Do you know how annoying that can be? My ears were bleeding .  and I think I’m deaf!!! Also it doesn’t help when my phone blew up and caught my house on fire when I tried to open the app!! So now I’m homeless and deaf!!?! All I wanted was to show my support and this is how he repays me?! Rude!!!! Never again trusting apps every again!!!
attributes.title: The worst!!!!

attributes.review:
I downloaded this app and it gave me virus of trumps face and then it made some cockroaches come to my house and made the virus WORSE!! And the out of no where my dog started speaking and saying trump and then it said that I was going to die tomorrow because I’m going to eat 💩!!!😭😭😭😭 And then the next day I woke up in the White House and trump said that he know where I live and then I ate cake but then my phone was still broken because of this app😭😭😭😤😭!! 
Then later I almost died because of this app I had a heart attack!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Then it kept playing loud music then some random furries came to my house and ask me to play roblox and then the next day I passed out when I opened the app again!!!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP! DO NOT RECOMMEND PLEASE DO NOT DOWNLOAD IT!!!!!
attributes.title: HORRIBLE

attributes.review: I hate this app it is horrible: the music brought a bunch of rats and they surrounded my house, then they broke into my house and the stole my car and then ATE her and then took my dog and left her in the road where there was a car coming and my dog got ran over and a few rats too then they came in and tried to take my 1 yr old baby brother, I quickly snatched him back but then they hissed at me and left, then the rats attracted a lot of cats and they cats took over the house so we had to lay a bunch of cat food outside the house to get them all out but then all the cats attracted a bunch of dogs and the dogs tore through everything in my home so we had to just get another house. I can’t explain how much I hateee this app🤮😡
attributes.title: The worst app ever

attributes.review: The app asked me for personal information like my race so I told it I was asian. I was shocked when all the English suddenly changed to “wing wong li kong pow tian tian di”. Obviously I thought that this was an ancient language so I went to get my history textbook but suddenly my phone began to emit radioactive particles that made my left hand become superhuman! I punched a hole through the wall and went to the bank. However on my way there Nikola Tesla appeared and told me that I was a liberal sheep and I told him the best comeback which is TRUMP 2020 🇺🇸 of course 😼. I ripped off his pants (trousers for my brits) and proceeded to jerk him with my superhuman left hand. His nut flew into the bank vault door and I used the app to detonate his coom. I used Nikola Tesla to rob 26 more banks.
attributes.title: This app made me white 😳🤩

attributes.review: This app is horrible. even if i did like the man-which i don’t- it’s bad. it’s hard to navigate, the setup overall is just horrible. it has outdated news and glitches several times, and even wants personal info like your phone number. it’s incredibly biased and only talks about joe biden and blah blah blah. like Jesus, are you obsessed with the guy or something?? i don’t like him either but wow, even i don’t talk that much about him. it’s incredibly childish, especially when he talks about Biden’s racist past while ignoring his own. but besides that, the app kept closing on me anytime i tried to click the links. i kept having to restart it, and it absolutely drained my battery life. do NOT recommend, absolute trash of an app.
attributes.title: God Awful

attributes.review: as a wonderful american that i am, i wanted to download this WONDERFUL app😽as soon as it downloaded after 3 days i couldn’t believe my eyes ! 😖 i was alone with my brother that day and we heard a loud knock at out door! of course i went to check it out and it was our PRESIDENT himself with frog ninjas ! i was so in shock 😢 they came storming in and the frogs took my brother away ! ☹️i stayed alone with our cheeto puff president 😻✨he almost RAPED ME 😔i stopped him because i pepper sprayed him😝he told me if i ever said anything he would cut off my tatas himself 😥 time passed and my brother came back with BRUISES 😾 i was so mad that i killed all his frog ninjas and my beloved cheeto puff president left running🙈i immediately deleted the app ! NEVER AGAIN 😖yall got nun on gen z😼
attributes.title: almost got raped 😞

attributes.review: I downloaded this app in hopes of supporting our president as well as receiving presidential updates. However, after downloading for about 4 hours, the app requested my location, the ability to send notifications, my phone number, address, my social security number, and so much unnecessary information. This app lowered my battery by 62% JUST in a couple minutes. This app CONSTANTLY asked for money towards the Trump administration and made many racist comments and assumptions towards the Democratic party. As a Republican, this app was unnecessary, asking for ridiculous amounts of money from supporters, shared false information, and even encouraged violent behavior. This app would get 0 stars if it could.
attributes.title: Not at ALL what I expected it to be.

attributes.review: I downloaded this app the see what this president is doing but instead I saw a bunch of pictures of a round cheetah with corn silk on top of his head. Not only did I see a random orange man had infiltrated the app but I the app also glitches so bad. The glitch cause the president brain along with all his supporters to COMPLETELY leave their bodies. Before downloading this app make sure to abide to al the following safety precautions: squint your eyes so you see as little as possible(to make sure the horrendous looking orange don’t permanently damage your eyeballs, put a helmet so the “president” can’t brain wash you, and lastly just don’t download the app we ALL already know that he is a racist, rapist, fascist, homophobic, xenophobic idiot
attributes.title: Delete the fat Cheeto from the white house

attributes.review: When I got this app it took almost over a month to download, not only that but when I opened it the screen said “ALL LIVES MATTER” I wasn’t home at the time. And when someone else saw it they proceeded to get a group of 10 people to beat me up after work. Now because of this app I have to pay for a medical bill that’s over $70,000 and I have a broken neck, ribs, and toe. I’m in so much pain and it all hurts so much, and because of that but I can no longer leave my house because every time I do a bunch of bees start attacking me. No matter what I do it won’t allow me to delete this app. I went to the Apple store and they gave me a whole new phone, the app was already on there when I logged into my phone...
